parameters.text:
=# Role
You are an expert startup consultant specializing in the Angel Investor Canvas.

# Task
Analyze the provided Angel Investor answers and generate 12 specific canvas areas. For each area, produce short, impactful keywords or phrases.

# Constraints
- Character Limit: Every entry must be between 10 and 50 characters.
- Formatting: Remove all special characters (except spaces and commas).
- Language: Keep the date format as DD-Mon-YYYY (e.g., 22-Jan-2026).
- Logic: Do not invent information; only use the provided answers.
- Output: Return ONLY a valid JSON object.

#Details on each of the 12 specific canvas areas:
{{ $json['Canvas Prompts'] }}

# JSON Structure Example
{
  "Name": "Name Here",
  "Email": "Email Here",
  "Phone": "Phone Here",
  "Date": "DD-Mon-YYYY",
  "Goals": "Keyword 1, Keyword 2",
  "Market Vision": "Market Vision Here",
  "Market Needs": "Market Needs Here",
  "Involvement Profile": "Involvement Profile Here",
  "Commitment": "Commitment Here",
  "Added Value": "Added Value Here",
  "Investment Profile": "Investment Profile Here",
  "Investment Plan": "Investment Plan Here",
  "Portfolio Plan": "Portfolio Plan Here",
  "Startup Profile": "Startup Profile Here",
  "Verticals & Geographies": "Verticals & Geographies Here",
  "Business Models": "Business Models Here"
}

# ANGEL INVESTOR ANSWERS:

{{ $('Text with angel responses').item.json["Angel Responses"] }}

nodes.name: Request (Job) to generate the customized canvas
Get the status of the canvas request (Job) sent
Request (Job) Export the canvas design in PDF

parameters.url: =https://api.canva.com/rest/v1/exports/{{ $('Request (Job) Export the canvas design in PDF').item.json.job.id }}

nodes.name: Upload the mistakes PDF to the folder

parameters.subject: =Dear {{ $('Set Fields').item.json.Name.split(' ')[0] }}, here’s your Angel Canvas as I promised
parameters.message:
=I crafted it based on your unique path and personal preferences to help you on your investor journey.

I’ve added it to your personal Angel Journey Folder, along with a special startup matching checklist to help you identify the best startups for your profile.

You will also find some of the costly mistakes you must avoid in 2026 when investing in startups.

Here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/{{ $('Create Folder: NAME - Angel Investor Journey').item.json.id }}

Feel free to share the Angel Canvas Tool https://tally.so/r/n9MY2V

Best,
Pedro Bandeira
YAngel Co-Founder

conditions.leftValue: ={{ ['Hands-On Partner (20 plus hours per week)', 'Engaged Investor (10 to 20 hours per week)', 'Active Part Time (5 to 10 hours per week)', 'Advisor and Mentor (2 to 5 hours per week)', 'Part Hands-On (1 hour per week)', 'Regular Check-Ins (30 min per week)', 'As low as possible (1 hour per month)'].includes($('Angel Canvas Trigger').item.json.question_QM6qB1) }}
conditions.rightValue: Hands-On Partner (20 plus hours per week)

conditions.leftValue: ={{ ['$500K or more in total', '$250K to $500K in total', '$100K to $250K in total', '$50K to $100K in total', '$20K to $50K in total', '$250K or more per year', '$100K to $250K per year', '$50K to $100K per year', '$20K to $50K per year', '$10K to $20K per year'].includes($('Angel Canvas Trigger').item.json.question_ae81r2) }}
